message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you first at a price of $12,000. I think it will be very valuable for you. What do you think?
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only willing to pay up to $9,500 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Bob, thanks for your offer.  I understand your position, but I'm confident this product is worth more than that. How about we meet in the middle at $11,000?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. However, I still believe the product is overpriced. Would you consider $10,000 as a final offer?
